search_results.title: About — Summer Brennan
search_results.snippet: Summer Brennan is an award-winning journalist and author. She is a recipient of the Matthew Power Literary Reporting Award, and was a visiting scholar.

search_results.title: Summer Allen | Profile - Greater Good Science Center
search_results.snippet: Summer Allen, Ph.D., is a Research/Writing Fellow with the Greater Good Science Center. A graduate of Carleton College and Brown University.

search_results.title: Summer R. Jackson - Faculty & Research
search_results.snippet: Summer Jackson is an Assistant Professor of Management in the Organizational Behavior unit at Harvard Business School. She teaches LEAD in the MBA required ...
